Description: The automation repository was established and end-to-end pipelines were configured for Android and iOS using BrowserStack. Robust reporting was implemented and flakiness was resolved through dynamic waits and retry logic.
Comments: Ensured a stable environment for multi-device execution.

Description: Stakeholder collaboration prioritised user stories for the automation of core login journeys. This included validating error handling for invalid credentials and password recovery functionality.
Comments: Successfully demoed these core flows during the Sprint Review.

Description: A library of reusable methods for managing plants and collections was developed to ensure script maintainability. Advanced teardown scripts using regular expressions were also built to automate data cleanup.
Comments: Resolved significant platform-specific XPath issues for iOS.

Description: Complex end-to-end user journeys were automated covering the full lifecycle of adding and deleting plant entities. The framework was integrated with TestRail and technical design documentation was finalised.
Comments: Presented the framework design and demos during Technology Weekly.

Description: Automated advanced plant management features including date filters
Comments: and card search validation. Comprehensive end-to-end tests for plant addition and deletion were completed and prepared for demonstration.
column7: Resolved extensive iOS XPath issues to ensure cross-platform stability.

Description: Development was focused on automated care tips across various seasonal parameters and wishlist/collection editing workflows. New user creation logic was implemented within scripts to improve test stability and environmental isolation.
Comments: Identified a blocker regarding subscriber feature access on BrowserStack.

Description: The iOS build pipeline was successfully migrated to macOS 14 with regenerated certificates to resolve OS-level failures. Pipeline debugging was improved through the implementation of enhanced logging and diagnostic statements.
Comments: Collaborated with internal teams to resolve critical distribution issues.

Description: The test execution pipeline was integrated with the application pipeline to automate app downloads and BrowserStack uploads. Advanced data deletion scripts were developed to manage test data cleanup as a prerequisite for regression testing.
Comments: Ensured pipeline readiness for upcoming integration testing phases.

Description: The "Discover" suite was expanded to include "Plant of the Day"
Comments: and "Articles for You" features. Automated tests were stabilised across iOS and Android while reports were refined to provide feature-level consolidation.
column7: Reported application alignment and attribute issues to development for UI fixes.

Description: A comprehensive stabilisation of the total regression suite was performed to ensure reliability for the RHS Grow App. Support was provided for CR1862 and code whitelisting to enable the semantic rollout for version 3.7.0.
Comments: Addressed specific iOS version conflicts and duplicate bundler installations in the pipeline.

Description: Infrastructure tasks included managing Terraform configurations for plant search indexing and troubleshooting MAPI state-file synchronisation. Collaboration with the PS team ensured secure log stream access for tech leads and production canary deployment monitoring.
Comments: Handled critical Cloudflare snippet filter configurations and dynamic DNS entries.

Description: Build pipelines were configured for the new KontentAI GraphQL library and pushed to Azure Artifacts with semantic versioning. Knowledge transfer sessions were conducted on the Kentico to KAI migration and SSIS database pipeline integration within the agent.
Comments: Established new repositories and feeds for the GraphQL service rollout.
